content: this seed sunflower square showcases the exquisite beauty of nature at its heart lies a rich chocolate brown center surrounded by a vibrant golden yellow ring that radiates warmth and cheer delicate pink petals bloom gracefully adding a soft touch of color and charm all of this is beautifully set against a serene backdrop of a soft blue framed in a crisp white border the magic lies in the dimensional texture created by popcorn and bobble stitches that make the sunflower seeds and petals pop forward giving incredible realistic depth and character
